name: Worble (ChooKing)
description:
Worble is an open source variant of Wordle for 6 letter words.  The main difference aside from word length is there is no word of the day. A different secret word is selected each time a new game starts and you can play as many times a day as you want. Also, the word list has not been edited to only include easy or inoffensive words but should not include any slang. 

Source code is available on github: https://github.com/ChooKing/Worble
